Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IArtifact, Eamon, Version=1.7.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.7.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: overgrown path

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You notice a grassy, wildly overgrown path leading off to the south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: wooden signpost

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a wooden signpost planted firmly in the ground nearby. It is worn and weather beaten, obviously quite old.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: small hatchet

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small hatchet with a sharp blade.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead kobold

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a dead kobold here, sprawled out on the ground. He apparently picked a fight he couldn't win.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: mountain backpack

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a rugged backpack here, specially built and suited to the needs of adventurers like yourself. The name of the owner is stitched into it.

Simple.name: StateDesc
Simple.value: with an intricately forged hilt

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: green glass broadsword

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a finely honed broadsword made of green glass, a rare volcanic material common to the southern regions of the Horn Belt.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Ring of Zylo

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the golden Rings of Zylo, impossibly interlocked in a way that defies the laws of physics.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: bulls-eye lantern

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a bulls-eye lantern here. It is rusty but still functional.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: torch sconce

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a torch sconce bolted to the wall of the cave.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a sturdy black flashlight here, seemingly out of place in the current scenario.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: small irregular firepit

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small irregular firepit in the center of the chamber. It is surrounded by stones haphazardly stacked to prevent spillover.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: iron-bound chest

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: An iron-bound chest, its flat top attached with sturdy hinges, sits to the side of the room, seemingly abandoned. You notice there is a gap between the back of the chest and the wall.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: bronze key

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a bronze key with an ornate handle.

Simple.name: StateDesc
Simple.value: that glows with an inner fire

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: deep red ruby

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a fist sized pigeon-blood red ruby, a truly dazzling gemstone.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: deep blue sapphire

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a deep blue sapphire, about the size of a walnut, a treasure fit for a king.

Simple.name: StateDesc
Simple.value: leaning against the north wall

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: old oak cabinet

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an old oak cabinet which has been padlocked. It features sturdy construction but you may still be able to breach it if you really try.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see some glass beakers.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see some glass flasks, suitable for potion-making.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see some tongs, appropriate for handling heated glassware.

Simple.name: StateDesc
Simple.value: that shimmers and pulses in a hypnotic display

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: prismatic cube

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a glimmering prismatic cube, a magical container that floats in mid-air.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: orb of life

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see the fabled orb of life.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Helfrick's body

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Helfrick's broken body lies on the ground nearby. You can still picture that sticker saying, "Hi, I'm Helfrick!"

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: majestic mountain

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The mountains reach out to touch the sky, beautiful spire-like peaks. They are snow covered year round.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: jewelry box

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The jewelry box is made of carved mahogany.

Simple.name: StateDesc
Simple.value: stamped with the likeness of Lord Byron Barnstormer

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: electrum coin

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see some finely minted coins. These are made of electrum, a mixture of gold and silver, and stamped with the likeness of the local Lord of the lands.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an elixer of unknown origin.

Simple.name: StateDesc
Simple.value: that has formed in the corner of the room

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: pool of water

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A pool of water of unknown depth has formed from a stream that flows through a crack in the northeast corner of the room. The light reflects off its still surface.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: bottle of mead

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see honey-colored dwarven mead in a fancy square bottle.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: loaf of bread

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a tasty-looking loaf of bread here.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dusty tome

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a dusty old tome here. Its cover appears cut from the finest leather; its pages are finely gilded paper.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: beef jerky

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a thick strip of premium grade beef jerky here.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: chocolate bar

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There is a delightful chocolate confection here, in a labeled wrapper.

Simple.name: StateDesc
Simple.value: which reeks of rotting plant matter

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead shambling mound

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a dead shambling mound here, decomposing in the hot mid-day sun.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: papyrus leaflet

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a fine papyrus leaflet here.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: suit of plate armor

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a rusty suit of plate armor emblazoned with a fancy insignia here.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: gold ring

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a beautifully crafted gold ring.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: small white pebble

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The white pebbles are not of much use or interest, although they do seem somewhat out of place. It is not clear how or why they were created.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There is a large chest in the center of the room.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead mimic

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The dead mimic lies in a formless blob in the room.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: caged wolverine

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large black wolverine trapped in a cage here. It has sharp teeth and long claws, and looks none too happy.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: red door

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a red door with a golden knob squarely in the middle.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: blue door

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a blue door here with a silver knob squarely in the center.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: green door

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a green door with a copper knob squarely in the center.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a long, thin-bladed knife.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a thick, gnarled tree branch used as a club.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dead wolverine

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a dead wolverine here, beaten and bloodied.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: rotting tree stump

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a rotting tree stump here, its roots giving way to the elements. There appears to be a gap under the stump, perhaps large enough to fit something in.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
